data.title: Capital City Carnage Demo Derby 2024
data.text:
TICKETS ONSALE Friday January 12 at 10AM

TIMES:

Friday - 7pm start

Saturday Day - 10am start

Saturday Night - 7pm start

*Doors open for GA 1 hour prior to start. Pit Pass holders can enter 2 hours prior to start.

PIT PASSES ARE FULL WEEKEND.

There are no daily pit passes.

Ages 2 and older will need their own ticket.

For Pit Passes, all ages will need a ticket.

8th Annual Capital City Carnage Demolition Derby

Friday & Saturday, March 1-2

Three events - Friday Night, Saturday Morning & Saturday Night

Itâ€™s Indoor Arena Demolition Derby! With nearly $100,000 in prize money, 395 drivers will come from all across North America to Topeka to compete!

Capital City Carnage is presented by Visit Topeka, Smash It Demolition Derby and Miller Lite!

More information at capitalcitycarnage.com

Can't make it to the arena? Watch live on PayPerView at DerbyNation.tv

_____________________________

CLEAR BAG POLICY:

*NO OUTSIDE FOOD OR DRINK. PATRONS ARE PERMITTED ON SEALED WATER BOTTLE

Clear bags no larger than 12"x12"x8" will be permitted into Stormont Vail Events Center.

One diaper bag per family with child will be permitted. Medical bags permitted that are specifically necessary/required for medical equipment and accommodations that cannot fit within the small bag. All bags are subject to search.

For all permitted bags and all prohibited items, etc., click HERE.

*One (1) unopened sealed bottle of water or one (1) empty water bottle is permitted per person.

TICKETING:

Mobile Entry is the easiest and safest way to access your tickets to this event. Please download your mobile ticket and add it to your Wallet before arrival.

NOTE: The first three rows of the lower bowl is reserved seating. Must have a Reserved Ticket for these seats. Pit Passes do not include reserved seats.

Weekend Pit Pass (All Ages)

**PIT PASSES ARE FULL WEEKEND and include a GA ticket. Reserved Seats would need to be purchased separately. There are no daily pit passes.

CASHLESS CONCESSIONS:

The concessions stands in Landon Arena, Ex Hall & Domer Arena are now fully cashless!

Patrons can use their debit card, credit card, or mobile device to make purchases at the concessions and enjoy faster transactions, shorter wait times and get right back to the entertainment.

Box Office will still accept cash for ticket purchases.

Merchandise sold at Northeast overlook by Happy Basset Beer Garden & Southeast Entry
